attributes.action: Stop the council closing Oakhaven nursing home York
attributes.background: My mothers 99 year old father in law has been a resident of Oak Haven nursing home for 2 and a half years, he's very settled in the home and the staff are wonderful! This is the first of 7 they are trying to close in York, in what is an already struggling elderly care system in York! Please sign!!

rejection.details:
we can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This nursing home is the responsibility of your local council.

York Council  has a petitions process - you can find out more about it here: http://democracy.york.gov.uk/mgePetitionListDisplay.aspx?bcr=1

You could also raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
